item.title: Innovation and Technology Management in Agriculture, Biotechnology and Chemicals
item.description: Food supply security Three technologies are key to ensuring security of food supply: seeds, fertilizers and crop protection chemicals. Society demands that each are used in ways that result in no adverse environmental impacts.

item.title: About Galileo Consulting
item.description: Galileo Consulting has deep capabilities in innovation and technology management, particularly in the fields of agriculture, biotechnology and chemicals. Scope We undertake engagements related to: product development and commercialization; business case analysis; technology valuation; and writing and editing technical reports Our strong quantitative skills in R and Excel attracts work:

item.title: Contact
item.description: <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="last-name">Last Name</label> <input id="last-name" class="pure-u-23-24" type="text"> </div> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="email">E-Mail</label> <input id="email" class="pure-u-23-24" type="email" required> </div> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="city">City</label> <input id="city" class="pure-u-23-24" type="text"> </div> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="state">State</label> <select id="state" class="pure-input-1-2"> <option>AL</option> <option>CA</option> <option>IL</option> </select> </div> </div> <fieldset class="pure-group"> <input type="text" class="pure-input-1-2" placeholder="A title"> <textarea class="pure-input-1-2" placeholder="Your message"></textarea> </fieldset> <button type="submit" class="pure-button pure-button-primary">Send</button>

item.title: Hello Blog in R
item.description: This shows how to run lm, tidy the output and format it for publication

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.
